PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02792018-03-12,  ,  ,  ,  CH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of BENJAMIN NYCUM of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective April 1, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of BENJAMIN NYCUM of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective April 1, 2018.
